ramani subasinhakolambaa hunupitiya gangarama wiharasthanaya mangin warshikawa pawathwana kolambaa nawam maha perahara 14 da saha 15 da rathri 7.00ta 36 wani waratath widi sancharaya kare.kolambaa nawa koralaye pradhana sanghanayaka gangaramadhipathi, aacharya galaboda gnyanissara himiyan ge anushasakathwayen pawathwena nawam peraharata uda pahatha derata wiwidha natum kandayamwalin samanwitha lankawe wiwidha pradesha walin paminena natum shilpin thundahasakagen pamana yuthu natum kandayam 175k pamana sahabhagi wimata niyamithaya.gangarama jinarathana karmika widyalaye shishyayan 1500k perahara sanwidhana katayuthuwalata sahabhagi wethi.kolambaa pradeshaye pawathwena wishalathama perahara kolambaa nawam perahara wana athara eeta bauddha janathawa menma hindu katholika, muslim aadi siyalu aagamikayange ha ema aagamika nayakayange sahayogaya da labe.mewara nawam perahare aarambhaka awasthawata mahinda rajapaksha janadhipathithuma saha wipaksha nayaka ranil wikramasinha mahatha da sahabhagi wimata niyamithaya.karthruta liyanna | mudranaya sandaha
